name: FinderMonkey
tag_list: people-finder, locate-debtors, find-friends, company-credit-checks, land-searches, unregistered-land-searches, trace-debtors, director-searches
overview:
FinderMonkey.co.uk are the uk’s premier people location specialists dedicated to finding people for a wide variety of reasons including tracing debtors, locating friends and family, finding heirs and benefactors. FinderMonkey.co.uk also provides its clients and customers with in depth company credit checks, directorship searches and locating company addresses.

FinderMonkey.co.uk uses trained staff for all its services so has no registration or login area. Simply fill in the details and let them find the information for you. FinderMonkey doesn’t just give you access to a database that is old or out of date, they have access to the best databases and use trained staff to find the information you require.

FinderMonkey does all work ethically and with integrity.
